guide.conclusion: give it to who its for or put it away

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: make a fake credit card look more realistic with a used xbox live points card
guide.introduction_rendered:
make a fake credit card look more realistic with a used xbox live points card

Relevant parts
  • Glue
  • Paper
Tools
  • Scissors

lines.text: Line the card you are doing this to with the card NOT being cut to the one that is getting cut
lines.text_raw: Line the card you are doing this to with the card NOT being cut to the one that is getting cut

lines.text: Glue the paper onto both cards(make sure to use enough to cover up the old text)
lines.text_raw: Glue the paper onto both cards(make sure to use enough to cover up the old text)

lines.text: Glue both cards together with the paper glued on
lines.text_raw: Glue both cards together with the paper glued on

guide.summary: I made it for my younger cousin who wanted a credit card badly
guide.title: Fake credit card thickened and made slightly more real
